item-attributes.item-attribute: Drag onto an item to apply

tier.tier-desc: This technique, usable on a weapon or dragon claw, gives the item a chance to do nature damage to a target.
With this formula, a skilled spellcrafter is able to craft a technique kit which can be applied to weapons and dragon claws.

tier-attributes.tier-attribute: Conflicts with: Applied Item, Damage Vs Undead Up
Special Note: With this formula scribed in your Formula Book when hunting high level undead, you will have a chance of having an Undead Core drop as extra loot.

tier.tier-desc: Specially prepared by Gaileach the Sorceress, this technique uses the power of Sorcery (and of the mind) to aid in spell attacks. Simply drag it onto your favorite spell (before scribing it!)
